statistics.online_location: Base SUSHI URL, ending in backslash

platforms: list of platforms covered by SUSHI credentials

issues.timeout: Boolean of the report is a timeout risk
issues.Platforms_Not_Collected: values of the second or third part of Platforms_Not_Collected value if any
issues.info: any other info about the issues not captured by the above
issues.attention: Boolean of if the issues need attention
issues.date: date this section was last updated
